userSignup.subject: Welcome to Share Settle!
userSignup.text: Welcome {userName} to Share Settle! We're thrilled to have you on board. Start managing your expenses and settle up with friends effortlessly.

groupCreation.subject: New Group Created on Share Settle
groupCreation.text: A new group '{groupName}' has been created on Share Settle. Start sharing expenses and settling up with your group members.

settlementNotification.subject: Settlement on Share Settle
settlementNotification.text: A settlement has been initiated for the group '{groupName}'. Log in to Share Settle to view and settle your expenses.

resetPassword.subject: Password Reset Successful
resetPassword.text:
Hello {userName},

Your password has been successfully reset. If you didn't initiate this change, please contact support immediately.

passwordChange.subject: Password Change
passwordChange.text:
Hello {userName},

Your password has been changed successfully. If this wasn't you, please contact support immediately.

changeUsername.subject: Username Change
changeUsername.text:
Hello {userName},

Your password has been changed successfully. If this wasn't you, please contact support immediately.

Settlement.subject: Settlement {status} between {user1} and {user2} on Share Settle
Settlement.text:
Dear {user1} and {user2},

We're writing to inform you that the settlement between you two on Share Settle has been {status}.
Amount: ${amount}
Date: ${date}

Next Steps:
Please log in to Share Settle to see the changes. If you encounter any issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
Thank you for using Share Settle!
Sincerely,
The Share Settle Team
